name: Dice Bonk
description:
Oh no! The White Crabs at it again, and now they 

want to eat all of the Dice Flowers! Bonk them on 

the head with your special d6 to make them scuttle 

away. But be careful: you can only move as many

spaces as your d6 will let you per turn.

Use the Arrow Keys, WASD, or your Mouse to select

your command, then press Space Bar or Left Click. 

On your turn, you'll roll your d6 to see how many

spaces you can move that turn. Move as many spaces

as you want to with the Arrow Keys or WASD, then 

press Enter or Right Click to confirm.

Move up next to a Crab and select the Attack 

command, then use the Arrow Keys or WASD to choose 

your target. Press Enter or Right Click to confirm.
